trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item" /> property is not set to an item when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 在处理 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item" /> 事件时，未将<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> 属性设置为某个项。
